transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Bataye sir.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji boliye sir.
Customer: Ji namaskar sir, vidhan bol raha hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Ji boliye.
Customer: Kaise hai sir?
Executive: Badhiya badhiya.
Executive: Services vagera sir kuch better hui plan ke baad?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Plan jo aapne avail kiya hai, maximizer wala.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Uske baad services mein kuch matlab better hua hai? Services vagera kaisi hai uske baad?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, mai keh raha hu sir aapne sar, mai keh raha hu sir aapne maximizer plan hamare sath liya tha.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: To, isko use kar rahe hai, kaisa experience hai matlab?
Customer: Sir use abhi kya bataye aapko, sir leads to wohi aa rahi hai, 1000 feet, 500 feet.
Customer: Jo mere ko pehle problem thi wohi leads aa rahi hai sir. Pehle baat hui thi sir aapse meri.
Customer: 1000 to 1000 feet, 500 feet wohi lead aa rahi hai.
Customer: Sir aap, aap ek, aapko ek example deta hu sir, maine ye jo maximizer plan liya na, mere ko ye bol kar diya gaya tha, pehle mera plan tha chota wala, jo 33, 33, 33, 36000 rupaye ka aapka aata hai na.
Customer: To usme leads yahi aa rahi thi, 200 feet, 500 feet, 1000 feet, 1500 feet ya last had mar 2000 feet.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Aur jo badi lead aati hai woh to just now click ho jati hai aap logo ki, deal done likha hua aata hai woh vaisa kuch.
Customer: To sir lead to koi badi mil hi nahi rahi hai, ab aap socho, aap abhi kaha ho sir?
Customer: Nahi office mein to ho, kaun se gaon mein ho, is shehar mein ho?
Customer: Noida, Noida ho sir. Example deta hu aapko sir.
Customer: Ab jaise aapko aapke ghar ke liye 1000, 1500 feet maal chahiye, to aap makrana lene aa jaoge kya sir?
Customer: Usse double to kiraya lag raha hai apna sir.
Customer: To ye maal kaun lene aayega? Mere ko maximizer mein isliye joda gaya tha ki sir aapko badi badi leads milegi.
Customer: Badi badi leads koi aa hi nahi rahi hai, mere use karne ka koi fayda hi nahi ho raha hai. Main to phir bhi 1000 feet walon ko, 2000 feet walon ko ye message dalta rehta hu.
Customer: Kuch leads use bhi use ki hai na maine to koi response aane wala nahi, sabka yahi hota hai, jaise abhi aapne jawab diya ki mai kaise lene aaunga.
Customer: Ab 1000, 1500 feet maal lene aayega usse jyada uska kiraya lag raha hai, royalty lag rahi hai, GST lag rahi hai, plus uska aane jaane ka kharcha lag raha hai.
Customer: Kaun aayega sir? Minimum kitna, sir minimum kitna feet chahiye aapko?
Customer: Sir kam se kam 6000 feet ho, 10000 feet ho, mere ko to bola gaya tha badi badi leads hai sara aapke paas mein.
Customer: Abhi wohi, wohi, wohi leads wohi aa rahi hai, ab watch machine hai ek piece aa raha hai.
Customer: Aade, ab usko kaise, kaise baat karu mai? Koi baat karne ka logic hi nahi hai, aap khud samjho sir. Ab aapko khud ko agar Noida mein maal chahiyega to aap makrana aaoge?
Customer: Isse achcha aap waha jitna paisa yaha aane mein kharch ho raha hai ya kiraye mein kharch ho raha hai woh paisa aap waha badha ke log hai na, duniya itni pagal to nahi hai na, waha se achcha maal le loge na, Delhi se.
Executive: Mujhe aapko kuch dikhana hai, abhi video meet kar sakte hai aap?
Customer: Lekin leads woh ki wohi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Nahi sir, mujhe aapko kuch dikhana hai, aap video meet join kar sakte hai ya nahi?
Executive: Ji, sir aaj Friday hai to namaz ka time ho raha hai, agar aap namaz baad call karoge 3 baje ke lagbhag to mai join kar lunga aapko.
Executive: 3 baje sone ka, nahane dhone ka, haan sir. Lekin sir ye jo maine bataya wohi ho raha hai, kuch process nahi hua sir aise thodi hota hai. Paise aap chahe humse ho le lo lekin maza nahi aa raha hai, aaj tak ek bhi leads matlab nahi hui. Mai to itni logic baatein karta hu jiski koi had hi nahi hai.
Customer: Customer ko bhi hum itna santusht karte hai.
Executive: Aapko yaad hoga ki jab hamari welcome call hui thi video meeting pe to same cheez aapne batai thi. Right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Same matlab aapko, ye hamari video meeting pe aapne, sir mujhe aapki team ne joda hi isliye tha ki maine kaha sir ye ye leads aa rahi hai, ye 32, 33000 rupaye jo aapne liye the na mere se GST sahit.
Customer: Jo chota wala plan hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To unhone kaha ki sir aap bade mein jaiye, maximizer mein aapke paas mein badi badi deal aayegi. Ab jaise koi temple ki deal aati hai, ab phone chalu hai, sab kuch chalu hai woh usko click karte hi woh deal done ho jati hai, ye mere samajh mein nahi aa raha sir, ek second mein deal done kaise hoti hai?
Executive: Aap kehte ho ki paanch bande baat kar sakte hai, ab mera to aaj tak call nahi laga sir, jhoot bolu to ye halaki ye 70, 80000 rupaye mayne nahi rakhte hai.
Executive: Lekin jo jhoot ki seema hai na, apne karmo ka yahi bhugat ke jana hai.
Executive: Dekhiye sir, pehli to baat ye hai ki 1000, 2000 feet ke liye koi bhi nahi aayega. Acha pehle suniye.
Customer: Kaun aayega sir aap batao, Delhi se, Mumbai se ya Jaipur se bhi koi nahi aayega.
Executive: Haan, lekin mai wohi keh raha hu aapko, aapne mujhse jab hum video call pe the welcome call ke time par to aapne same cheez mujhe batai thi aur maine uska resolution bhi bataya tha ki kya resolution hai. Please sir, mind mat kariyega meri baat ko, maine jo cheez aapko batai thi woh cheez aapne nahi kari.
Executive: Aur mai abhi check kar raha hu woh cheez bilkul sahi hai. Aap video meet pe jaise jaise bataya vaisa to kar raha hu mai.
Customer: Leads use nahi ho rahi, leads se mera time barbaad kyu karu sir mai 500, 1000 feet wala, woh mere ko woh same hi jawab milte hai.
Executive: Nahi mai us cheez pe bilkul baat nahi karunga, theek hai aur aisi kisi bhi cheez pe discussion nahi karunga ki aapka time kharab ho. Right? Hmm. Abhi aapne bataya ki aapka namaz ka time hai, aap aaram se jaiye namaz padhiye aur mai 3 baje aapko video meet pe dikhaunga kya issue hai, kis vajah se aapko lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Aur, aur abhi woh phone aaya tha woh kya kehte hai jo meri char woh banai hai na, unhone woh karwaya tha Google meet up ke through, haan mail ID kya hai, to woh karwaya to maine kar diya, bole baki ka aapko karna padega, maine kaha sir mere samajh mein nahi aata agar aap karwao to kar lunga mai.
Executive: Kya karwana padega?
Customer: Woh kya domain vagera tumhara hai na, bole ye char ID humne banai hai na isko woh click kar lo, woh kar lo, woh karwaya tha unhone.
Executive: Login karna hoga aapko.
Customer: Haan login vagera woh bahut lamba process hai sir samajh mein nahi aata woh.
Executive: Nahi dekhiye lamba process nahi hai, actually char mail ID hai isliye charo mail ID ka process hai isliye lamba hai, mai batata hu kya hota hai. Aapne kabhi.
Customer: Ek to, ek to unhone karwa di, maine kaha charo aapke through hi karwa do na daba dab, bole mai aapko phir call karta hu baad mein, to abhi do din to ho gaye call aaya nahi unka, aapki team ka.
Executive: Sahi, koi baat nahi aap is topic ko bhi dhyan rakhiyega, abhi jab hum 3 baje baat karenge to mai try karunga.
Customer: Mai to ye kehta hu jaise, ek minute lunga aapka, agar mera achcha kaam nikalega to mai mere ghar parivar mein ya mere dosto ko ye kahunga na ki sir IndiaMART se judo. Ek kaam se do kaam nikle tab apan success hai na sir.
Customer: Jab mera hi kaam nahi ho raha to mai kisi ko, mai kisi ko mana hi karunga na sir.
Executive: Bilkul.
Executive: Kisi insan ka koi benefit kahi se agar mila tabhi woh uski tarif karega, right? Agar nahi hoga, abhi mai kaam kar raha hu, chalo mera mandir ka Nairobi, Kenya mein bhi kaam chal raha hai, India mein bhi chal raha hai, Birmingham, Hockley road pe bhi chal raha hai.
Customer: To mai waha achcha kaam karunga, achcha result dunga tabhi woh meri tarif karenge ya dusre ko kaam batayenge, nahi to yahi kahenge makrana se koi Abdul naam ka chor aaya tha.
Executive: Right.
Executive: To usme to apan success nahi hai na.
Executive: Dekhiye jab tak mai aapka account maintain kar raha hu, meri process puri rahegi ki aapko aisa good luck nahi milega. Hmm. Right? Hmm. Sir abhi leads aisi aisi aa rahi hai to ab batao kya kare? Use karne se baad same jawab milta hai sir.
Executive: Dekhiye mai aapko same jawab nahi dunga, right? Aur koshish karunga.
Customer: Client keh raha hu jo aapki leads aati hai na woh mere ko same jawab dete hai ya koi bhaiya koi, koi to aisa aisa bolta hai ki bhaiya itna to logic aap bhi samajhte ho, 1000 feet maal lene hum waha se itni dur kaise, ke itna to ya UP se kuch.
Executive: Vyaparik product hai, theek hai aap 20 minute ka time nikal lena, mai aapko dikha bhi dunga ki lead nahi aa rahi hai aur mai ye bhi dikha dunga ki kaise aayegi, right?
Customer: Sir woh aap bataoge tabhi to hum karenge, hame to, hame to jo leads milti hai woh sirf product maine bheje woh add kar diye, phir unhone samjhaya aapki team ne time liya vaisa maine de diya.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Haan mai wohi to keh raha hu kyuki abhi one by one nahi ho sakta, teen.
Customer: Customer dena to aapke haath mein hai.
Customer: To mera achcha kaam nikalega.
Executive: Dekhiye mai, dekhiye agar mai aapka achcha kaam nahi de paunga, kal ko mai renewal ke liye aapko call karunga, aap bhi response nahi denge. Right? Hmm. Wohi cheez aapne boli thi agar mai aapko achcha kaam dunga tabhi aap apne dosto se kahenge ki IndiaMART se judo, to wohi.
Customer: Haan, wohi keh raha hu.
Executive: Hai na sir?
Customer: Ji, to sahi hai, theek hai. Mai aapko 3 baje ka meeting link dal raha hu, 3 baje hum join kar sakte hai. Sorry sir 3 baje I think shayad meri ek invitation meeting hai, agar 3 baje nahi hui to mai 3 baje join karunga otherwise mai 4 ya 4:15 ke baad.
Customer: Late kar lena, 4:30 baje kar lo, 5 baje ke lagbhag kar lo, 4, 4:30 baje.
Executive: Jab bhi mai jaldi free rahunga mai aapko call kar dunga.
Customer: 5 baje ka sahi rahega, 5 baje kar lo aap.
Executive: Theek hai, aap jab bataye mai tab chalunga.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay okay, theek hai okay okay, thank you, good afternoon.
Executive: Okay. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are of small quantity (1000-2000 ft).

- Big leads get clicked immediately.

- No benefit from Maximizer plan.

- Faces issues with login process.



Resolution:

- Executive will show the customer the issue on video meet.

- Executive will try to resolve login issues.



Next Steps: 

- Video meet to be scheduled later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, maximizer plan, login, video meet
